preSeed_injection_map.{SQL_QUERY}: SELECT c.13_primary_category, COUNT(DISTINCT ci.ivr_call_id) AS call_count FROM vz-it-pr-fjpv-vzdsdo-0.ds_work_tbls_no_gsam.convoiq_poc_april_data_convoiq_simplified AS CI WHERE LOWER(ci.overall_sentiment) = "negative" AND DATE(ci.event_dt) BETWEEN DATE("2025-04-01") AND DATE("2025-04-04") GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY call_count DESC LIMIT 10
preSeed_injection_map.{USER_INPUT}: List top intents for customers whose calls had negative sentiment.
